Detailed Description

This interface is used to implement tasks that will be run by the BgTaskManager.

virtual void BackgroundTask::doBackgroundTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr  )  [protected, pure virtual]

Implemented in PrerequisitesOrder, LoadChunkTask, FindSeedTask, CStyleBackgroundTask, ThreadFinisher, ScheduledModelLoader, BGResourceRefsLoader, Terrain::Resource< O >::ResourceTask, and MPSBackgroundTask.

virtual void BackgroundTask::doBackgroundTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr,
BackgroundTaskThread *  pThread 
) [inline, virtual]

This method is called to perform a task in the background thread.

Derived classes will often add themselves back to the manager at the end of this method by calling mgr.addMainThreadTask( this ). This allows this object to complete in the main thread.

virtual void BackgroundTask::doMainThreadTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr  )  [inline, virtual]

Reimplemented in FindSeedTask, CStyleBackgroundTask, ThreadFinisher, ScheduledModelLoader, BGResourceRefsLoader, Terrain::Resource< O >::ResourceTask, and MPSBackgroundTask.
